name: Flux8
description: As a sentient magnet, enslaved in a factory, you have two options: work or be terminated! However, not all magnets are born to work. Some dream of freedom and choose to rebel. There’s a whole wide world waiting just outside those factory doors… you must remain positive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or Newer Processor: Intel i3 4xxx above or AMD equivalent Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Graphics above or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 4xxx above or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650M above or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
